Point3D * point
 Pointer to the next inner skin of decoration layer. Can be either another decoration or a (real) Point3D.

Detailed Description

Abstract class that can extend or "decorate" a Point3D.

Here we force the user/implementor if this decorator interface to re-implement all functions of Point3D, which will be most of the times just forwarded to the Point3D reference "point".

brics_3d::Point3DDecorator::Point3DDecorator ( Point3D *  point)

Constructor that requires a Point3D pointer.

Parameters:
[in]pointThe Point3D that will be copied and wrapped/enhanced/decorated by this decorator.

Note that there is no standard constructor, to prevent a situation with an Point3DDecorator instance, but no internal Point3D specified.

void brics_3d::Point3DDecorator::decorate ( Point3D *  point)

decorates a point

Decorating means that the decorator takes over ownership/responsibility for that (inner) point. NOTE: there is no copy created, in contrast to the copy constructors.

Point3D * brics_3d::Point3DDecorator::getPoint ( )

Gets the next inner skin of decoration layer With this function it is possible to traverse recursively the layers, depending on what kind of object type is returned.
